trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具中，為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項提供設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TreeViewDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TreeViewDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得此設計工具的行動清單集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個設計工具相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 針對設計階段的關聯控制項，取得要在 [自動格式化] 對話方塊中顯示的預先定義自動格式化配置集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> object that contains the predefined schemes for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> 物件，包含控制項的預先定義配置。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box to edit the line images for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，以編輯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的線條影像。

trans-unit.source: The data bound control.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: 將關聯控制項繫結至設計階段資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box to edit the data bindings.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊以編輯資料繫結 (Data Binding)。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box to edit the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊以編輯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取在設計階段用來代表控制項的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 HTML 標記文字，這個文字用來在設計階段呈現相關聯控制項的預留位置。

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段用來利用空資料來源以呈現控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 已擲回的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 當錯誤發生時，提供在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 當錯誤發生時，在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 建構可在設計階段用於相關聯控制項的範例資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> 介面的物件，可用來做為衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl" /> 之控制項的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> that can be cast as a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />，可轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides for custom initialization of the given <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，提供指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的自訂初始設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer uses a temporary preview control to generate the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，其中該值會表示控制項設計工具是否使用暫時預覽控制項以產生設計階段 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, <see langword="false" />, if the control designer uses the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component" /> property for the control contained in the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項設計工具針對設計階段預覽使用控制項的暫時副本，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則，如果控制項設計工具針對控制項設計工具中所包含的控制項使用 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="false" />。
